entry.title: Garland SUME-100 - Electric Convection Oven - 10.4 kW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Garland
Type: Single Deck Convection Oven
Price: 3484.00

Garland is consistently being recognized and sought after for their commitment to quality and energy efficiency. All of their equipment is made in Canada, with the exception of induction, which is Swiss-made!

The Garland SUME-100 is a part of the US Range Summit Series of gas convection ovens. It is electric, and has solid state control with an electro digital timer and a direct spark ignition with a 100% safety shutoff. The interior is porcelain enameled with coved corners. Inside there are five chrome plated oven racks on 13-position rack guides.

      • Made in Canada
      • NSF approved
      • Electric
      • Solid state control
      • Porcelain-enameled interior
      • Five chome-plated oven racks with thirteen adjustable positions

SPECS

Brand Garland
Model SUME-100
Dimensions (WDH) 29" x 24" x 24"
Electric 208v, 240v / 60 Hz / 1 phase or 3 phase

WARRANTY

One year limited parts and labour warranty.

entry.title: Garland SCO-ES-10S - Electric Convection Oven - 10.4 kW
entry.summary:
Vendor: Garland
Type: Single Deck Convection Oven
Price: 3035.00

Ranges, griddles, broilers, induction -- Garland does it all. They've won awards from both Kitchen Awards®️ and Energy Star®️, being consistently recognized and sought after for their commitment to quality and energy efficiency. All of their equipment is made in Canada, with the exception of induction, which is Swiss-made!

The Garland Sunfire series SCO-ES-10S is a full-size, electric convection oven with standard depth. It has 10.4 kW of power, and it comes with the Sunfire series signature solid state controls with a digital timer.

The front, sides, top, and legs of the Garland SCO-ES-10S are constructed of stainless steel. The interior is porcelain enameled with coved corners. You can fit five chrome plated oven racks on 13-position rack guides. Lastly, this machine is NSF approved!

      • Made in Canada
      • NSF approved
      • Sunfire series solid state control with digital timer
      • Full-size, standard depth
      • 10.4 kW of power
      • Single speed fan control with .6 HP fan motor
      • Stainless steel front, sides, top, and legs
      • 60/40 dependent solid door design
      • Porcelain enameled oven interior with coved corners
      • Five chrome plated oven racks on 13-position rack guides
      • Comes with 25.5" legs with bullet feet

SPECS

Model SCO-ES-10S
Dimensions (WDH) 29" x 24" x 24" 
Electrical 208v - 240v / 6 Hz / 1 or 3 phase

WARRANTY

One year limited parts and labour warranty. Three year limited door warranty.

entry.title: Axis Hybrid - Electric Bakery Convection Oven with Steam Injection - 5 Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Axis
Type: Bakery Oven
Price: 4578.00 - 5511.00 (6 variants)

The Axis Hybrid is a full size, electrical convection oven with a five shelf capacity. The overall dimensions (WDH) are 29.5" x 32.9" x 30.1". It comes equipped with a modern digital display and time and temperature controls, as well as ninety-nine different programs with four stage cooking capabilities. It lets you roast, fry, reheat, and much more!

This convection cooker guarantees even heat distribution with a solid 5.5 kW of power generated from the N°2 engine. It has 5 shelves and reversing fans. 

      • Fits five, full size sheet pans
      • Digital display and time/temperature controls
      • Electronic thermostat control
      • Manual mode and program mode
      • Ninety-nine programs with four stage cooking and stage end alarms
      • Core Probe cooking program (with Core Probe Kit included)
      • Moisture injection mode with ten levels and manual injection
      • N°2 powerfull motors
      • Two speed bi-directional reversing fan system
      • "Safe-Touch" vented side hinged door
      • 304 stainless steel oven chamber
      • Five wire oven racks supplied
      • Optional: stand with six shelves

entry.title: Vollrath COA7002 - Half-Sized Countertop Convection Oven - 3 Shelves
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vollrath
Type: Countertop Convection Oven
Price: 1495.00

The Vollrath COA7002 is a countertop convection oven and a member of their signature Cayenne® line. It's perfect for those wanting to diversify their menu with baked goods. The machine has three shelves that fit half-sized sheet pans, and its overall dimensions (WDH) sit at 24" x 24" x 18". Its exterior is crafted of tough stainless steel.

This countertop oven comes equipped with a custom baffle fan and diffuser plate to ensure your goods are cooked evenly. Additionally, it has a 120-minute bake timer that turns off after a set time. And with knob guards on the thermostat, you don't have to worry about those accidental adjustments.

      • Stainless steel interior and exterior finish
      • Custom baffle fan for consistent air flow
      • Ventless operation
      • 120 minute timer automatically switches oven off after set time
      • Removable shelf runners and rounded interior corners for easier cleaning
      • Supplied with non-tip, chrome plated steel shelves
      • Interior light for monitoring cooking
      • Temperature range of 66° - 299°
      • Knob guards to protect thermostat and timer against damage or accidental changes
      • Broil function
      • UL tested and verified

SPECS

Model COA7002
Item 40703

Temperature Range 66° - 299°
Electrical 120v / 12.5a / 1500w
Plug 5-15P

entry.title: Imperial ICV-2 - Gas Convection Oven - 140,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Imperial
Type: Double Deck Convection Oven
Price: 14019.00

The Imperial ICVG-2 is a standard depth gas convection oven that has been built with top quality parts and construction, made entirely in the USA. This oven's "Turbo-Flow" air system creates an air flow pattern that heats the inner and outer surfaces of the oven cavity at the same time, and recirculates hot air to maximize efficiency for energy savings.

It has a porcelainized oven interior for easy cleaning. It has an intelligently designed and rugged door: the door handle is secured to an internal stainless steel chassis system, not the door finish. And four bearings per door extend the life of the door mechanism. It comes with manual controls, which offer a 2-speed fan control for general baking and roasting, and an oven cool-down switch which has 2 fan speeds.

Imperial has been making high-quality, top-value cooking equipment since 1957. They use innovative manufacturing processing with state-of-the-art technology and machinery to enhance efficiencies, lower production costs, and offer top-quality equipment.

      • Made in the USA
      • Fast temperature recovery
      • 2-speed 1/2 hp motor for high production cooking and delicate baking
      • Double bearings on the top and bottom of each door
      • Four bearings per door extends the life of the door mechanism
      • Door chassis is fortified to withstand constant opening and closing
      • Handle is secured to an internal stainless steel chassis system, not the external door finish
      • One hand opens and closes both doors simultaneously
      • 60/40 doors open to 130° for complete interior access
      • Large window for viewing product at a glance
      • Porcelainized oven interior for easy cleaning and better browning
      • 2 interior oven lights with a momentary switch outside the oven
      • 10 rack positions for maximum versatility
      • 5 oven racks included
      • Manual controls are standard

SPECS

Model ICVG-2
Output 140,000 BTU
Ship Weight 1005 lb
Dimensions (WDH) 38" x 41.5" x 74"
Manifold Pressure 5" W.C. (NG) | 10" W.C. (LP)
Manifold Size 3/4"
Electrical 120/1/60
Max Amps 9

WARRANTY

One year parts and labour warranty.

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Ikon IGCO SINGLE - Gas Convection Oven
entry.summary:
Vendor: Ikon
Type: Single Deck Convection Oven
Price: 3491.00

The Ikon IGCO SINGLE is a gas convection oven that can run on natural gas or liquid propane. It ships as natural gas, but a conversion kit is supplied with each unit. The front, sides, and top exterior of this oven is constructed of stainless steel. It contains three inshot burners, 18,000 BTU each. The fan motor is two-speed, and with 1/2 HP fan the rotations can range from 1140 - 1725 rpm. The fan also has a forced 'cool down' fan mode.

The oven interior is constructed of porcelain enamel. It also has two halogen interior lights. Five nickel plated racks come with this oven, and the oven interior has ten possible rack positions. The temperature range is 66° to 260° Celsius. The oven is ignited electronically, has an electronic thermostat, & manual timer control. 

      • Ships as natural gas, but also runs on liquid propane; a conversion kit is supplied
      • Front, sides, and top exterior are constructed of stainless steel
      • Three inshot burners in the interior, 18,000 BTU each
      • Two-speed fan motor with 1/2 HP; forced 'cool down' mode
      • Porcelain enamel oven interior
      • Two halogen lights in the interior
      • Five nickel plated racks with ten possible rack positions
      • Temperature range of 66° - 260° Celsius
      • Electronic ignition

SPECS

Model IGCO SINGLE
Overall Dimensions (WDH) 38" x 44" x 60"
Oven Interior (WDH) 29" x 23" x 19"

entry.title: Southbend BGS/22SC - Double Deck Gas Convection Oven - 108,000 BTU
entry.summary:
Vendor: Southbend
Type: Double Deck Convection Oven
Price: 7830.00

The Southbend BGS/22SC is a full-size, double-deck gas convection oven that has 108,000 BTU of power per hour (54,000 BTU per cavity). It is a standard depth oven, so it can accommodate one full-size (18" x 26") sheet pan for every oven rack, left to right within the oven. You're able to order this oven in either natural gas or liquid propane.

It has a high-quality stainless steel front, sides, and top, and has a patented "plug-in, plug-out" control panel, which makes it incredibly easy to service. It has 11 rack guides in each oven and comes with 10 plated oven racks (5 per cavity). The standard controls are from 140°F to 500°F, with a solid-state thermostat and 60-minute mechanical cook timer.

These are just a few of the great features that Southbend has built into this rugged convection oven. Southbend has been in the business since 1898, so to say they know what they're doing is an understatement. They know what their clients need, and they pack it all into a sturdy, well-built machine.

      • 54,000 BTU Per Oven Cavity (NAT or LP)
      • Available in standard depth
      • Double deck convection oven is 66.8” in height
      • Patented “plug-in, plug-out” control panel easy to service
      • Slide-out control panel for full view servicing
      • Stainless steel front, sides, and top
      • Dependent doors with windows (Full 180° opening)
      • Energy-saving, high-efficiency glass windows
      • Heat keeping dual door seal system
      • Coved, porcelain interior
      • Stay-cool, heavy-duty door handle.
      • Soft Air, two-speed, 1/2 hp fan motor
      • 11-position rack guides and 5 plated oven racks (per cavity)
      • Electronic ignition
      • Forced cool down fan mode
      • Oven “heat” light cycles with burners
      • Oven “ready” light

SPECS

Model BG/22SC
Dimensions (WDH) 38" x 37.25" x 66.75"
Oven Interior (WDH) 29" x 21.5" x 20"
Rack Clearance (WD) 28.25" x 27.25"
Gas 54,000 BTU per cavity
Connection One 3/4" male
Required min. Inlet Pressure 7" W.C. (NG) or 11" W.C. (LP)
Electrical 120v, 60 Hz., 1 phase

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

    1. Inshot burners operate with the same concept as jet engines. Each burner has a single large opening where the air and gas mix. This ensures a consistent burn and eliminates the possibility of clogging. 
    2. Fully insulated factory sealed, flat panel glass system. Larger panels for better product viewing. Grease vapor resistant in between glass panels. 
    3. Water-resistant control panel seal with new heavy-duty drawer mount slides for improved serviceability and a new brushed steel poly panel. 
    4. Soft heat mixing zone technology allows hot air to be mixed with cooler air from the baking chamber to produce tempered air for even baking and cooking. 
    5. A new thermal isolated phenolic/chrome handle and toggle point door closing system. 
    6. Two-stage door sealing system with integrated doorstop to eliminate seal bending/damage. 304 stainless spring steel gasket backed with a steel rope gasket on top and bottom.

    OPTIONS & ACCESSORIES

    Looking for some options or accessories? Give us a call and we'd love to help you out!

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty. More details.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Southbend BES/27SC - Double Deck Electric Convection Oven - 15 kW - Energy Star Certified
entry.summary:
Vendor: Southbend
Type: Double Deck Convection Oven
Price: 8144.00

The Southbend BES/27SC is a full-size, double deck electric convection oven that has 15 kW of power per hour. It is a standard depth oven, so it can accommodate one full size (18" x 26") sheet pan for every oven rack, left to right within the oven. You're able to order this convection oven in a number of different electrical capacities.

It has a high quality stainless steel front, sides, and top, and has a patented "plug-in, plug-out" control panel, which makes it incredibly easy to service. It has 11 rack guides in each cavity and comes with 10 plated oven racks (5 for each cavity). The standard controls are from 140°F to 500°F, with a solid state thermostat and 60 minute mechanical cook timer. Plus, it's Energy Star compliant and NSF approved!

These are just a few of the great features that Southbend has built into this rugged convection oven. Southbend has been in the business since 1898, so to say they know what they're doing is an understatement. They know what their clients need, and they pack it all into a sturdy, well-built machine.

      • Energy Star Compliant
      • 7.5 kW high efficiency heating elements
      • Available standard depth
      • Single deck convection oven is 55" in height (with optional casters)
      • Patented "plug-in, plug-out" control panel easy to service
      • Slide out control panel for full view servicing
      • Stainless Steel front, top and sides
      • Dependent glass doors (Full 180° opening)
      • Energy saving high efficiency glass windows
      • Heat keeping dual door seal system
      • Coved, fastener-free, porcelain interior
      • Stay cool heavy duty door handle
      • Soft Air, two speed, 1/2 hp, fan motor
      • 11-position rack guides and 5 plated oven racks
      • Solid state temperature controls
      • Forced cool down fan mode
      • Oven "heat" light cycles with burners
      • Interior oven lights

SPECS

Model BES/27SC
Dimensions (WDH) 38" x 37.25" x 64"
Oven Interior (WDH) 29" x 21.5" x 20"
Rack Clearance (WD) 28.25" x 21"

FROM THE MANUFACTURER

    1. Inshot burners operate with the same concept as jet engines. Each burner has a single large opening where the air and gas mix. This ensures a consistent burn and eliminates the possibility of clogging. 
    2. Fully insulated factory sealed, flat panel glass system. Larger panels for better product viewing. Grease vapor resistant in between glass panels. 
    3. Water-resistant control panel seal with new heavy-duty drawer mount slides for improved serviceability and a new brushed steel poly panel. 
    4. Soft heat mixing zone technology allows hot air to be mixed with cooler air from the baking chamber to produce tempered air for even baking and cooking. 
    5. A new thermal isolated phenolic/chrome handle and toggle point door closing system. 
    6. Two-stage door sealing system with integrated doorstop to eliminate seal bending/damage. 304 stainless spring steel gasket backed with a steel rope gasket on top and bottom.

    OPTIONS & ACCESSORIES

    Looking for some options or accessories? Give us a call and we'd love to help you out!

    WARRANTY

    One year parts and labour warranty. More details.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

The Southbend BGS/23SC is a full-size, double-deck gas convection oven that has 80,000 BTU of power per hour (40,000 BTU per cavity) -- and it is Energy Star compliant, which will save you a lot of money on your energy bill. It is a standard depth oven, so it can accommodate one full-size (18" x 26") sheet pan for every oven rack, left to right within the oven. You're able to order this oven in either natural gas or liquid propane.

It has 11 rack guides in each cavity and comes with 10 plated oven racks (5 per cavity). The standard controls are from 140°F to 500°F, with a solid-state thermostat and 60-minute mechanical cook timer.

These are just a few of the great features that Southbend has built into this rugged convection oven. Southbend has been in the business since 1898, so to say they know what they're doing is an understatement. They know what their clients need, and they pack it all into a sturdy, well-built machine.

entry.title: Vulcan SG44 - Double Deck Gas Convection Oven with Soft Bake Mode - 120,000 BTU - Energy Star Certified
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vulcan
Type: Double Deck Convection Oven
Price: 20875.00

The Vulcan SG44 is a powerful, top-tier convection oven, with 120,000 BTU per hour -- it's a powerful oven that also gives you precise controls and a soft bake function. So you'll be able to evenly cook a wide variety of items, from delicate baked goods, to meat, vegetables, casseroles, and more. You can go from the gentle bake mode to heavy load operation with the flip of a switch.

This is an energy efficient oven with a fast heat recovery: it has been Energy Star Certified, so it will end up saving you money on your energy bill. It has the lowest idle energy rate of all full-size gas convection ovens. So overall, with the SG44 you're buying the perfect combination of performance and control. For more information on this oven, check out Vulcan's brochure.

      • Stainless steel front, sides, top and door gaskets
      • Easy-to-clean porcelain-coated enameled steel interior
      • 120,000 BTU/hr total input
      • Gentle bake mode selector switch for greater flexibility
      • Independently operated doors with full-length hinge pins and welded full- door frames
      • Full-view door windows
      • 1/2 HP 2-speed fan motor
      • Auxiliary fan switch for rapid cool-down
      • European-style, easy-to-replace interior lights
      • 11 position rack guide and 5 nickel-plated oven racks (per section)
      • 3/4" gas connection with internal combination gas pressure regulator and safety solenoids system

    SPECS

    Model SG44
    Width 40.25
    Depth 41.1" including handles

entry.title: Vulcan VC55GD - Double Deck Gas Convection Oven with Removable Doors - 100,000 BTU - Energy Star Certified
entry.summary:
Vendor: Vulcan
Type: Double Deck Convection Oven
Price: 11223.00

The Vulcan VC55GD is a top of the line convection oven, with a high-quality design from top to bottom, inside and out. It is an Energy Star Certified oven that will deliver consistent results and save you money on your energy bill. Rather than trying to cut corners, Vulcan has stuck with quality.

This oven will offer the versatility your kitchen staff needs to prepare a varied menu with consistently great results. It features gentle air circulation and even heat distribution, which will produce delicious, evenly-cooked, professional quality casseroles, meats, vegetables, sides and baked goods.

Kitchen managers can also expect increased productivity with simple and intuitive controls, scalable capacity, and decreased operating costs. Vulcan responds to their customer's needs by introducing enhancements like grab-and-go oven racks, cool-to-the-touch door handles, optional left-side controls, and the KI Award Winning VC5 oven with removable, easy to clean doors.

      • 2017 KI Award Winner
      • 5 nickel-plated oven racks with 11 rack positions
      • Cool-to-the-touch door handles
      • Intuitive, simple to use controls with rapid cool down switch
      • Stainless steel doors, front, sides and top
      • Porcelain enamel on steel oven interior
      • Standard depth, double deck (2 oven sections) on 8" legs
      • Lift-off, removable doors for easy cleaning; 2017 Kitchen Innovations Award Winner Independent glass doors
      • Simple dial controls with bright LED display and built-in diagnostics
